page.title: 18Hi-tech in Leicester
page.content: Leicester has a computer controlled{ {Automated Traffic Signals}system. Traffic Light timing is dependant on the time of day and the object is to limit the length of traffic queues at junctions. However if a long queue develops or an emergency vehicle needs to get through,{manual control}can take place. Traffic queues are detected by{monitor cameras}at each major junction. Every bus in the City Council's service,{Leicester City Bus,}is radio controlled to ensure a regular and reliable service. A number of{textile factories}use{ {computerised knitting machines.}The patterns are programmed into the computer, and when a different pattern is selected, the yarn needles are changed in seconds instead of up to a day which used to be required.
